mapper.select: select bbsseq, bbstag, title, likecount, readcount from (select row_number()over(order by readcount desc) rnum, bbsseq, bbstag, title, likecount, readcount from bbs where bbstag in (2, 3, 4) and wdate >= DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 7 DAY) and likecount >= 1 and del=0 order by readcount desc) a where rnum between 1 and 10

select bbsseq, title, readcount, bbstag from (select row_number()over(order by readcount desc) rnum, bbsseq, title, readcount, bbstag from bbs where bbstag=${bbstag} and del=0 order by readcount desc) a where rnum between 1 and 5
